title: CREATURE COMMANDOS
subTitle: The DCU's weirdest war heroes, the Creature Commandos are nowhere near as monstrous as those they've faced on the battlefield.

title: AMANDA WALLER
subTitle: If there’s one government bureaucrat who shouldn’t be messed with, it’s Amanda Waller, founder of the infamous Task Force X

title: WEASEL
subTitle: A Task Force X survivor, Weasel has great agility in combat... but don’t hire him to babysit your kids.
